Name: Sargeant PixelShade
Description: Once a decorated member of the Digital Defense Force, Sargeant PixelShade is a battle-hardened warrior with an orange box chassis and a screen that has seen better days. The cracks across his screen are not just signs of his resilience in cyber combat but also badges of honor. His classic button configuration is a throwback to the golden age of arcade battles, while his soldier-style limbs are a testament to his countless victories. Despite wearing shades to conceal his battle scars, there's a fiery determination that flickers in his pixelated gaze. Sargeant PixelShade is a respected member of the WebtrES club, often sharing stories of his pixel-pounding adventures and inspiring others to be as bold and fearless as his indomitable spirit.
